definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: Nine Thai officers from the anti-narcotics unit have since been charged with murder.
sentences.chinese: 泰国缉毒部队的九名人员已被指控犯有谋杀罪。

sentences.english: The government brought two hundred eighty-five charges against him, mostly for murder.
sentences.chinese: 政府对他提出二百八十五费，主要用于谋杀。

sentences.english: Huey was awaiting trial for murder.
sentences.chinese: 休伊因谋杀罪正在等候审判。

sentences.english: When the jury pronounced him guilty of murder, john did not bat an eye.
sentences.chinese: 当陪审团宣判约翰犯有谋杀罪时，他面不改色。

sentences.english: Detective Barton : And yet, you got engaged to the man who murdered your husband.
sentences.chinese: 不一定，你曾经和谋杀你丈夫的人定了婚。

sentences.english: He has done a great deal more years than many murderers, pedophiles and psychopaths .
sentences.chinese: 他的时间比许多谋杀犯，恋童癖者和精神病患者都多。

sentences.english: This day, John sees a drama again, call 《park street murder case 》.
sentences.chinese: 这天，约翰又去看一出戏，叫《公园街谋杀案》。

sentences.english: Thee-publishing which cannot murder the tradition publishing businesses.
sentences.chinese: 电子出版不能谋杀的传统出版业务。

sentences.english: One of his colleagues was murdered 11 years ago by Guangdong gangsters.
sentences.chinese: 他的一个同事11年前被广东的歹徒谋杀。

sentences.english: Bronco was a bodybuilding champion who was imprisoned for murdering his wife.
sentences.chinese: 布兰槿是一个健美冠军，他因谋杀妻子而入狱。

sentences.english: How many times do you believe that Fidel Castro has tried to kill you?
sentences.chinese: 那你知道菲德尔卡斯特罗有多少次试图谋杀你吗？

sentences.english: At one point, he even demanded to know who was behind the killing of JFK.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至一度要求知道是谁策划谋杀了肯尼迪总统。

sentences.english: When you say that I murdered him treacherously and foully , you lie.
sentences.chinese: 你说我狡猾而肮脏地谋杀了他时，你说的是谎言。

sentences.english: But one month later, the bus conductor was murdered too.
sentences.chinese: 但二个月后，公车售票员也被谋杀了。

definition: to conspire to murder/to plot against sb's life
to conspire with sb/to plot/a conspirator/a partner in crime/an accomplice
see 過失致死罪|过失致死罪[guo4 shi1 zhi4 si3 zui4]
to kill/to cause death/to do sb to death
